review: We love this little stick. It replaced a Roku in my daughters room. This has way more features. I love that she can pull up all of her Amazon music on this and play it through her tv. This may not be as beneficial if you don't have Amazon Prime. It is designed to enhance the Prime features and make them easily accessible on ones tv. I also love that it's small and doesn't take up any room. The Roku was an ugly lump on her dresser. Overall it was a great purchase. I may purchase a second for the tv in my room.
author: Melissa Newton

review: I have been enjoying this. It is similar to Roku and seems to work well with my smart tv.
author: Marcia A.

review: I love it!  It's so easy to use and if you have Prime you get a lot of great shows and movies
author: nick

review: Just hooked it up today, work fine and a nice set up,I have one from Sony. this Fire stick is easy to use
author: Leslie A Marsh

review: Very easy to install, now i can enjoy too many hours in front of my TV!
author: chrisi

review: Love it! Love it! Love it!
author: G. West
